original_text: But there was a strong tower within the city, and thither fled all the men and women, and all they of the city, and shut it to them, and gat them up to the top of the tower.
korean_text: 성읍 중에 견고한 망대가 있으므로 그 성읍 백성의 남녀가 모두 그리로 도망하여 들어가서 문을 잠그고 망대 꼭대기로 올라간지라

sentences.original_text: But there was a strong tower within the city
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그 성 안에 견고한 망대가 있었는데

sentences.original_text: and thither fled all the men and women
and all they of the city
and gat them up to the top of the tower
